q1: Do you think Arsenal live up to their reputation (used to be at least, Boring!)
q2: Has Arsenal ever won a Cup?
a2: They have never won a chamipons leauge.
a3: Depends who you are.  As a Liverpool fan, I think it is very good that Arsenal has never won the Champions League.
q4: Arsenal players were on the pitch for 1820 minutes at the World Cup - around 50 hour
q5: The Emirates Stadium (known as Ashburton Grove prior to sponsorship, and as Arsenal Stadium for UEFA competitions) is a football stadium in Holloway, London, England, and the home of Arsenal F.C.
